title: 2024 will be the year the housing crisis dwarfs the cost of living
description: The real story of 2024 may well be that the cost of living crisis will be replaced by a cost of housing crisis. Even if wages finally outpace inflation, and even if some food and energy prices ease, the sheer difficulty in paying a rent or mortgage may further undermine any sense of security.

title: NANA AKUA: I'd rather see a pay rise for frontline doctors than backseat politicians
description: While I don't agree with reckless public-sector strikes, I'd rather see a pay rise for frontline doctors than backseat politicians,' writes Nana Akua

title: Perry pleads poverty when he has more Council Tax than ever

title: Cuts to spending on new homes 'unacceptable' as Glasgow faces 'housing emergency'

title: Harrogate 'man of community' launches confident bid to win chance to fight in former Tory minister's seat
description: A Harrogate ‘man of the community’ has launched his campaign for the Labour nomination for Skipton and Ripon with the confidence that Conservative MP Julian Smith's seat is vulnerable at the next General Election.

title: Wellingborough contest to provide early test for Sunak in election year
description: The result in Wellingborough will be an early test for the Tories and Labour ahead of the general election expected in 2024. The Tories will decide when to start the by-election process after the Commons returns in January. Mr Bone had been sitting as an independent after losing the Conservative whip in the aftermath of the ruling.

title: Gove 'backing blockers to building new homes' - York housing chief
description: Mr Gove, the UK government’s housing secretary, said his new planning reforms would increase the supply of new homes. He said he would name and shame councils that failed to hit their building targets and if they delayed or rejected legitimate applications, they could lose their planning powers.

title: Drakeford ‘optimistic’ about Labour’s election chances despite Welsh budget cuts
